data.title: Elroi Church
data.desc: Webapp for Elroi Church, a Christian church located at sawangan.
data.backendRole: Creating Api for Elroi Church, and Elroi Church Admin, Moving app from typegoose to mongoose using the Official NestJS, Creating DTO, Api Docs with swagger, compodoc and postman, implementing repository design pattern, create giving feature using Mitrans Payment Gateway, Deploy App to the server.

data.title: WikoPOS
data.desc: Wisata Kopi Point of Sales, Web-Based App for managing Transaction Data and Products, Print Invoice, See or Print the Daily, Weekly, Monthly or Yearly income.
data.backendRole: Create Api manjorly for Crud Operation, and store products image to AWS S3, Create Login with Laravel Sanctum, perform query to generate report and invoice.
data.frontendRole: Create interactive and responsive interface with Vue, and TailwindCSS.

data.title: Matics
data.desc: Web-based Voice Recognition App for turning your voice into text.
data.frontendRole: Create interactive and responsive interface with Vue, and TailwindCSS.
